Saremo presenti ad ECOMONDO - ITALIAN EXHIBITION GROUP  2024, dal 5 all’8 Novembre. Ci troverete al Rimini Expo Centre, Hall C3, Stand 301. Venite a scoprire il nuovo T815 e la nuova cabina!Non mancate!

We will be at Ecomondo 2024, from 5th to 8th November. You will find us at Rimini Expo Centre, Hall C3, Stand 301. Come and discover the new T815 and the new cab there!

#ecomondo #tabarelli #materialhandler #recycling

Nuova cabina 2024:
-   Design moderno
- Maggior sicurezza (questa cabina è molto più solida e le griglie protettive superiori e frontali sono più robuste rispetto alla precedente)
- Comfort (cabina più grande come abitacolo, visibilità lato destro aumentata, climatizzatore con potenza doppia rispetto alla precedente)
- Sistema di filtraggio aria ottimizzato (doppio filtro)
- Display touch screen 7”
- Estintore in cabina
- Nuovo cruscotto con porta telefono, porta bottiglie e vasca porta oggetti dietro al sedile che permette di mettere un piccolo frigo
- Cambio filtro aria esterna e rabbocco liquido tergi cristalli molto agevole aprendo la portellina in ABS
- Griglia anteriore e superiore sono apribili per consentire la pulizia dei vetri
- Assistenza remota
 
New Cab 2024: 
- Modern design:
- Better security: the front and upper protective grilles have been reinforced, providing additional protection for the operator
- Enhanced comfort: the cockpit is more spacious; side visibility, particularly on the right side, has been improved; air conditioning system has doubled its power.
- Optimised air filter system: improved by adding a double filter.
- 7-inch touch screen display:
- Cab fire extinguisher
- New multifunctional dashboard with a telephone holder, a bottle holder and a storage tub located behind the seat, that can also be used to store a refrigerator
- Ease of maintenance:** easily allows access to components without having to remove parts of the cab.
- Accessibility for window cleaning:** Both the front and top grille are designed to be openable.
- Remote assistance
 #tabarelli #materialhandler #recycling #newcab

T510 material handler for Sierra International Machinery  :
- Stage V Cummins engine (129 kw/175 hp)
- 13 m boom
- 4 outriggers

Der BMA Maschinenvertrieb Tabarelli Material Handler bewirbt sich mit einem Beitrag zum Erreichen der Klimaziele für den Innovationspreis der Region Göttingen Northeim. Mit rein für den Batteriebetrieb entwickelten Materialumschlagmaschinen helfen die Hannoveraner der kommunalen und privaten Recyclingbranche bei der Transformation hin zur Elektrifizierung des Maschinenparks.

#innovationspreis #gemeinsamzukunftgestalten #wirtschaftsförderung #göttingen #landkreisgöttingen #northeim #regiongöttingennortheim #wrg #klimainnovationspreis #niedersachsenDer BMA Maschinenvertrieb Tabarelli Material Handler bewirbt sich mit einem Beitrag zum Erreichen der Klimaziele für den Innovationspreis der Region Göttingen Northeim. Mit rein für den Batteriebetrieb entwickelten Materialumschlagmaschinen helfen die Hannoveraner der kommunalen und privaten Recyclingbranche bei der Transformation hin zur Elektrifizierung des Maschinenparks.

Tra i ritmi della produzione e la forza dei materiali, la Pasqua ci ricorda il valore delle pause vere.
Tabarelli Spa augura a tutti giorni di equilibrio, rinnovamento e serenità.

Amid the pace of production and the strength of materials, Easter reminds us of the value of true pauses.
Tabarelli Spa wishes you days of balance, renewal, and peace.

Introducing the newest addition to the Sierra lineup: the T815 Material Handler.

Engineered for heavy-duty performance, the T815 features our patented Fly-Cab — offering ground-level entry and an impressive 19-foot elevation for unbeatable visibility.

Designed with the operator in mind, the T815 offers:
✔️ 53-foot boom reach
✔️ Automatic and centralized manual greasing systems
✔️ Rear and side infrared cameras with dedicated display
✔️ Load-sensing hydraulic system with electronic power control
✔️ AC/heat climate controls
✔️ Bluetooth radio with cell phone connectivity
✔️ Fuse relay drawer conveniently located under the seat
✔️ No DIN hydraulic fittings or flat O-rings
✔️ Pilot hydraulic joysticks (not electronic)

Built for those who demand more from their equipment — the Sierra T815 is in a class of its own. 

Want to know more? Reach out today 📲 https://lnkd.in/gZ5HMB9P

This week we’re proud to be at Sierra International Machinery  in the USA, presenting the latest evolution of the Tabarelli T815.

One of the standout features? Our patented Flycab® system — a cab that lowers almost to the ground, allowing operators to get in and out easily, safely, and without climbing.

Because true innovation isn’t just about power or performance. It’s about people.
When comfort and safety come first, productivity follows.

Grateful for the trust and collaboration with Sierra — and excited to keep pushing boundaries together.

⸻

#Tabarelli #Flycab #SierraMachinery #InnovationDrivenByPeople #MaterialHandler #OperatorFirst #SmartEngineering #MadeInItaly

On the move with the new Tabarelli T815.
We’re in the U.S.A, hosted by Sierra International Machinery  for a dedicated training session— focusing on the electric and hydraulic systems, as well as the latest innovations introduced in the new cab.
A great opportunity to share knowledge, exchange insights in the field, and showcase the full potential of our next-generation scrap handling machine.
#Tabarelli #T815 #Training #ScrapHandling #Innovation #MadeInItaly #SierraInternationalMachinery #materialhandlers  #recyclingOn the move with the new Tabarelli T815.

Engine removal made efficient and precise — the Rozzi R580GRA12 at work. A custom bracket on the material handler at ensures vehicle stability while the grapple does its job with power and accuracy. An excellent example of teamwork between strength and control in industrial dismantling.

Engineering strength, delivering precision.
Introducing the Tabarelli T510, designed for high-demand demolition and recycling operations.

Featuring a 10-meter boom, 4 outriggers, and a 4.5L Stage V engine delivering 129 kW, this material handler offers both power and reliability.
The machine is equipped with full automatic lubrication, an intuitive OPUS-B4 7” display, and camera coverage — ensuring safety, efficiency, and control in every condition.

In the photos: mounted with a VTN CI1200 shear. The machine will also be delivered with a Rozzi R580GRA12 grapple, combining versatility with brute strength.

Built for industry. Backed by tradition. Engineered to lead.

#Tabarelli #MaterialHandling #DemolitionEquipment #RecyclingMachinery #HeavyEquipment #VTN #Rozzi #InnovationInMotion #IndustrialSolutions #MadeInItalyEngineering strength, delivering precision.

Innovation That Lifts the Future

We’re excited to invite you to Rema 2025 in San Diego, where technology and performance come together.

From May 12–15, discover the latest in material handling at the Sierra International Machinery  booth — #A8 — featuring Tabarelli’s advanced material handlers:
	•	The T815 with patented FlyCab system, designed for maximum operator safety and visibility.
	•	The T409-2CE, our fully electric material handler delivering clean power without compromise.

Looking for innovation that moves your business forward?
We’ll see you at Booth A8.
